title: Where can official comprehensive documentation for the PIxel 4a be found?
content: I want to find complete, official documentation for the Verizon implementation of the Pixel 4a smartphone. By this, I mean a single , comprehensive reference in which any aspect of using the device with it's initial release operating system can be found. So far as I have been able to determine, there is no official user guide for the device. So how can a user who who is new to both the device and the operating system best learn how to become proficient at using it. After hours of searching the web for documentation, I most I have been able to fine are a few books on the 4a written for primarily for beginners. The most comprehensive of which is the 332 page User Guide by Nelly Robins.
